mapper.select: select exhibition_no as exhibitionNo, exhibition_title as exhibitionTitle, exhibition_start as exhibitionStart, exhibition_end as exhibitionEnd, exhibition_photo as exhibitionPhoto, exhibition_time_start as exhibitionTimeStart, exhibition_time_end as exhibitionTimeEnd, exhibition_age as exhibitionAge, exhibition_price as exhibitionPrice, exhibition_detail as exhibitionDetail from exhibition where exhibition_no = #{exhibitionNo}

select nn.exhibition_no as exhibitionNo, nn.exhibition_title as exhibitionTitle, nn.exhibition_start as exhibitionStart, nn.exhibition_end as exhibitionEnd, nn.exhibition_photo as exhibitionPhoto, nn.exhibition_time_start as exhibitionTimeStart, nn.exhibition_time_end as exhibitionTimeEnd, nn.exhibition_age as exhibitionAge, nn.exhibition_price as exhibitionPrice, nn.exhibition_detail as exhibitionDetail from (select rownum as rnum,n.* from(select * from exhibition order by exhibition_no desc)n)nn where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update exhibitioin_review set ex_review_status=1 where ex_review_no=#{exReviewNo}
update exhibition_review set ex_reviewContent=#{exReviewContent} where ex_review_no=#{exReviewNo}
mapper.select: select ex_review_no as exReviewNo, exhibition_no as getExhibitionNo, ex_review_writer as exReviewWriter, ex_review_content as exReviewContent, ex_review_star as exReviewStar, ex_review_date as exReviewDate, ex_review_status as exReviewStatus from exhibition_review where exhibition_no=#{getExhibitionNo} and ex_review_status = 0 order by 1 desc
